attributes.action: Make contraceptives a subsidised priority for the NHS and international aid
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Stop the massacre in Gaza
Save the children
Watch the story
March the plaza
Blood and glory
Children are far beyond our need
To breed them broods a murderous deed
As they fight for lives
Without thought
Any creed
That indoctrinates minds
To be sown as the seed
In fertile imagining of hopeful young
Born but to fight parents' pension wars
Born for the gun

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
